entry.title: BTC Lisp as an alternative to Script
entry.summary: The extracted information highlights a programming decision related to the ordering of operators. Specifically, it mentions an initial inclination to replicate Chia's `>s` operator. However, upon further consideration, the programmer realized that when dealing with sequences like `A B C`, it is more logical to arrange them from smallest to largest. This adjustment underscores a thoughtful approach to enhancing code readability and efficiency by aligning the sequence order with natural numerical or alphabetical ordering.
